author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...LORENZO GAINING STRENGTH OVER THE TROPICAL ATLANTIC...
summary: ...LORENZO GAINING STRENGTH OVER THE TROPICAL ATLANTIC... As of 11:00 PM AST Mon Oct 13 the center of Lorenzo was located near 16.2, -42.8 with movement NW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 999 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...LORENZO GAINING STRENGTH OVER THE TROPICAL ATLANTIC... As of 11:00 PM AST Mon Oct 13 the center of Lorenzo was located near 16.2, -42.8 with movement NW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 999 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Lorenzo (AT2/AL122025)
